mapper.insert: insert into pro_workload (id, title, pro_id, project_number, `desc`, type, all_work_load, enclosure_info, state, create_id, create_time) values(#{id}, #{title}, #{proId}, #{projectNumber}, #{desc}, #{type}, #{allWorkLoad}, #{enclosureInfo}, #{state}, #{createId}, #{createTime})

INSERT into pro_workload_related_tasks (id, workload_id, task_content, execute_people, mon_amount, mon_time, tues_amount, tues_time, wed_amount, wed_time, thur_amount, thur_time, fri_amount, fri_time, satu_amount, satu_time, sun_amount, sun_time, all_work_load) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.workloadId}, #{item.taskContent}, #{item.executePeople}, #{item.monAmount}, #{item.monTime}, #{item.tuesAmount}, #{item.tuesTime}, #{item.wedAmount}, #{item.wedTime}, #{item.thurAmount}, #{item.thurTime}, #{item.friAmount}, #{item.friTime}, #{item.satuAmount}, #{item.satuTime}, #{item.sunAmount}, #{item.sunTime}, #{item.allWorkLoad})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, c.user_name userName, CASE a.type WHEN '1' THEN '上一周' WHEN '2' THEN '本周' WHEN '3' THEN '下一周' END workLoadType, b.project_name projectName, a.project_number projectNumber, a.all_work_load allworkload, a.`desc` remark, a.state, d.process_instance_id processInstanceId, a.create_id createId, a.enclosure_info enclosureInfo FROM pro_workload a left join pro_workload_process d on a.id = d.workload_id, pro_project b, sys_eve_user_staff c WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.pro_id = b.id AND c.user_id = a.create_id

SELECT b.task_name taskContent, a.execute_people executePeople, a.mon_amount monAmount, a.tues_amount tuesAmount, a.wed_amount wedAmount, a.thur_amount thurAmount, a.fri_amount friAmount, a.satu_amount satuAmount, a.sun_amount sunAmount, a.all_work_load allWorkLoad, a.mon_time monTime, a.tues_time tuesTime, a.wed_time wedTime, a.thur_time thurTime, a.fri_time friTime, a.satu_time satuTime, a.sun_time sunTime FROM pro_workload_related_tasks a, pro_task b WHERE a.workload_id = #{workloadId} AND a.task_content = b.id
mapper.insert: insert into pro_workload_process (id, process_instance_id, workload_id, state, type, sub_id, sub_time) values(#{id}, #{processInId}, #{workloadId}, #{state}, #{type}, #{subId}, #{subTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.workload_id workloadId FROM pro_workload_process a WHERE a.process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId} AND a.state = '0'
SELECT a.task_content taskId, a.all_work_load allWorkload FROM pro_workload_related_tasks a WHERE a.workload_id = #{workloadId}
SELECT a.workload_id id FROM pro_workload_process a WHERE a.process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM pro_workload_process WHERE workload_id = #{id} AND state = '0'
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, c.user_name writePeople, a.type, a.pro_id proId, a.project_number projectNumber, a.all_work_load allworkload, a.`desc`, a.enclosure_info enclosureInfo, a.state FROM pro_workload a, sys_eve_user_staff c WHERE a.id = #{id} AND c.user_id = a.create_id

SELECT a.task_content taskContent, a.execute_people executePeople, a.mon_amount monAmount, a.tues_amount tuesAmount, a.wed_amount wedAmount, a.thur_amount thurAmount, a.fri_amount friAmount, a.satu_amount satuAmount, a.sun_amount sunAmount, a.all_work_load allWorkLoad, a.mon_time monTime, a.tues_time tuesTime, a.wed_time wedTime, a.thur_time thurTime, a.fri_time friTime, a.satu_time satuTime, a.sun_time sunTime FROM pro_workload_related_tasks a WHERE a.workload_id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, d.process_instance_id processInstanceId, a.title, c.user_name writePeople, CASE a.type WHEN '1' THEN '上一周' WHEN '2' THEN '本周' WHEN '3' THEN '下一周' END workLoadType, b.project_name payType, a.project_number projectNumber, a.all_work_load allworkload, a.`desc` remark, a.enclosure_info enclosureInfo FROM pro_workload a, pro_project b, sys_eve_user_staff c, pro_workload_process d WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.pro_id = b.id AND c.user_id = a.create_id AND a.id = d.workload_id
mapper.delete: DELETE a.*, b.*, c.* FROM pro_workload a LEFT JOIN pro_workload_process b ON a.id = b.workload_id LEFT JOIN pro_workload_related_tasks c ON a.id = c.workload_id WHERE a.id = #{id}
